import { UserService } from './services/user.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.scss'], }) export class RegisterComponent implements OnInit { show = true; constructor(private userService: UserService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.userService.getUsers$.subscribe((x) => { console.log(x); }); } hideShow() { console.log(this.show); this.show = !this.show; } }
